english_example_sentence: If I opened this old box, I would find interesting things.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я открыл эту старую коробку, я бы нашел интересные вещи.
turkish_example_sentence: Ben bu eski kutuyu açsam, ilginç şeyler bulurum.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben bu eski kutuyu ______, ilginç şeyler bulurum.
